name: Inventory Cable Connector
pages: The inventory cable connector connects the inventory to the inventory network, or gives it access to the network. Required to connect cables to $(l:terminals)terminals/$. Place it on a lvl 1 beacon to make a link accessable anywhere in the same dimension and a lvl 2 beacon accessable anywhere. Both sides of the chunk have to be loaded. Additionally requires a $(l:patchouli:cables/inventory_cable)inventory cable/$ in its recipe.
